text: 10:22 Ofa Gami 8:30; Esekiel 36:25; Efesus 3:12; 5:26; Hibru 9:14; Jems 1:6; 1 Jon 3:21A uan ghuzim isa en navir averiaba dav kɨnizɨ an e akɨrizɨ, e kamaghɨn fo, e arazir kuraba puvatɨgha Godɨn damazimɨn bar zue. Egha a dɨpar bar dɨkɨriamɨn en mɨkarziba rue. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ifavarir arazir en navir averiabar itiba, e bar ada ateghɨva, okam nɨghnɨghan kogh nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikɨ, egh an boroghɨn mangam.
